message.body: Hey dan, this is Noah from stake land. I got an email from Susan leber about day playing on your art dept tomm. I emailed her that I could work, but just wanted to send you a text as well. Talk to you soon!
I just heard! Awesome dude! It's funny they wouldn't let us hire anyone and now they're trying to find dayplayers to wrap a location because we're swamped haha. See you soon buddy!
Haha seems to always work like that. Will Susan give me info (time, location, etc.) about tomm or someone from art dept?
She should let you know, it'll probably be something like 8am. It's in Westport on the Sound
